pageTitle: Blooming marvellous river boat service to RHS Chelsea Flower Show

title.title: Blooming marvellous river boat service to RHS Chelsea Flower Show

texts: The most famous garden event in the world starts on 24 May so why not make your day extra special this year with the help of London River Services and travel to the spectacular by river boat.

During the five day long Royal Horticultural Society (RHS) Chelsea Flower Show one of our River Bus operators, Thames River Taxi, will be operating temporary services calling at the conveniently placed Cadogan Pier.
Boats will call in the morning and the evening on each of the days, serving selected eastbound and westbound piers. See the timetable .
Ticket prices are £7.50 for a single journey or £12 for a return; Travelcard holders benefit from discount ticket prices of £5 for a single journey or £8 for a return.
So make the most of the Great Spring Show this year with the help of London's river services.
